Mekhala：The city of birth of Sumana Buddha and the scene of his first sermon to Sarana and Bhāvitatta （Bu．v．21； BuA．125f）．It was there that Mangala Buddha converted his chief disciples，Sudeva and Dhammasena （BuA．120）．Revata Buddha once preached there to an assembly of one thousand crores of people （BuA．134），while later，King Uggata built，for Sobhita Buddha，the Dhammaganārāma in the same city （BuA．139）．
